name: TornadoTown
description:
A small game made for my 4yr old nephew.

Single Player; You drive through a town as an ai Tornado chases you. It gets slightly faster

the longer you play until it catches you.

Multiplayer; Player controlled Tornado chases players through town getting slightly faster until it catches all the players.

You can be tornado in multiplayer mode only.

If you join late you will not see the destruction. I should have done a lobby but this was a quick project.

Please let me know if you find any bugs :)
